comments: On the User Libraries preference page, if you use the Import... button to select an improperly formatted file, then cancel, pressing the Import... button again will do nothing.  This also happens if you delete the previously selected file.

The following shows up in .log when you hit the Import... button and it fails:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 2006-10-09 12:04:59.906
!MESSAGE Unhandled event loop exception

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2006-10-09 12:04:59.906
!MESSAGE assertion failed: Path for IClasspathEntry must be absolute
!STACK 0
